SELECT COUNT(CI.ConstructInstanceIdx) FROM ConstructInstance AS CI

SELECT CI.ConstructInstanceIdx, CI.Title, CI.Content, CI.Thumbnail, CI.Hit, CI.CreateDate, CI.UpdateDate,
A.AdminIdx, A.AdminName, A.AdminId,
CF.CommonFileIdx, CF.Url, CF.FileName, CF.IsMain
FROM ConstructInstance AS CI
LEFT JOIN Admin AS A ON A.AdminIdx = CI.AdminIdx
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUB_CIFM.FileMappingIdx, SUB_CIFM.ConstructInstanceIdx,
SUB_CF.CommonFileIdx, SUB_CF.Url, SUB_CF.FileName, SUB_CF.IsMain
FROM ConstructInstanceFileMapping AS SUB_CIFM
INNER JOIN CommonFile AS SUB_CF ON SUB_CF.CommonFileIdx = SUB_CIFM.CommonFileIdx AND SUB_CF.IsMain = '1'
) AS CF ON CF.ConstructInstanceIdx = CI.ConstructInstanceIdx
WHERE CI.ConstructInstanceIdx = #{constructInstanceIdx}
